title: Why is Malala Yousafzai so famous? Is she overrated? - Quora

response.answer_text: You know about Nobel price? She got that. You think she is overrated because all the comparison going on with APS children and other people with her. She was an activist who got shot by terrorist, people think it was staged but I know a doctor who operated her. So we need to do little research before saying she is overrated.
